description: This file is a bitbake recipe (.inc) for building and configuring the Dropbear SSH server and client within an embedded Linux build system. It specifies dependencies, sources, build configurations, install steps, systemd integration, and other build-related instructions.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Defines the installation steps for the Dropbear packages, including copying configs, creating symlinks, and setting up systemd service files.
